author: Anonymous Beaker
title: Related edX Modules or Lecture Files
question: My problem set partner and I are really struggling on PSet5 and can't seem to find much that is helping on edX or in the lecture files. Would someone be able to advise us as to what they used when stuck on starting this problem set? Thanks so much:)
student_answer:
Your best bet is filtered-rain which is in the problem bank.
I don't really know exactly which ones but I'm pretty sure there are problems in the problem bank that deal with altering a universe program by using a different data definition.
